title: 212.2 VOX Mini - Should Infants be Baptized?
description:
This episode, Mike, Bonnie and Tim tackle a question on infant baptism. What did Jesus say? Is it necessary for children to be baptized, like an insurance policy?

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
